/// <reference path="../../ref.d.ts" />
import ToastController from "./toast-controller";
 
/**
 * @ngdoc directive
 * @name xui.directive:xuiToast
 * @restrict E
 *
 * @parameters
 * @param {any} xuiToast Model bound to the element to be highlighted.
 *
 * @description
 * Attribute-based directive used to synchronize the highlighting of an element with a toast message.
 *
 */
 
/**
 * Xui Toast directive
 */
export default class Toast implements ng.IDirective {
    public restrict = "A";
    public scope = false;
    public controller = ToastController;
    public controllerAs = "toastCtrl";
    public bindToController = {
        xuiToast: "&"
    };
 
    public link = (scope:ng.IScope,
                    element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery,
                    attrs:ng.IAttributes,
                    ctrl:ToastController): void => {
 
        ctrl.setElement(element);
    };
}
